item.title: Help with Code
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

[quote="`ZeroScape, post:3, topic:340256"]What Deathschaos9 said:

if (command.startsWith("firecape") && playerRights >= 0) { try { String name = command.substring(9); int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.jad = 1; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; sM("You just gave " + name + " the ability to wear fire capes"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Edit: This will give everyone ability to change other’s abilities to wear firecape, because of the >= 0 statement. I suggest > 0 :P[/quote]

The error shows at c.jad the arrow points at the “.” between c and jad…
How do I fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Code
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

What Deathschaos9 said:

if (command.startsWith("firecape") && playerRights >= 0) { try { String name = command.substring(9); int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.jad = 1; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; sM("You just gave " + name + " the ability to wear fire capes"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Edit: This will give everyone ability to change other’s abilities to wear firecape, because of the >= 0 statement. I suggest > 0

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Code

@deathschaos9 wrote:

Substring should be 9 not 6.

item.title: Help with Code
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

I’m trying to make a command where I can give players the ability to wear fire capes:

if (command.startsWith("firecape") && playerRights >= 0) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.jad = 1; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; sM("You just gave"+command.substring(4)+" the ability to wear fire capes"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Thats what it looks like… It doesn’t work. And I am using a Deltascape source

Read full topic
